Text: It’s a powerful tool that helps make quick changes
This program is great and has lots of potential. The user interface is intuitive and makes it easy to filter results. However, when I try to edit a link, I get an error.
Tags: Potential, Easy | Good, Ease of Use | filters | bug

Text: You need to work on your Feature Y capabilities, they are not as good as your competition.
I like how you made feature X easy to use. This reduces a lot of complexity when I want to onboard new customers.
